tika-vin05t14:1_0: 72.Pathavīti dve pathavī jātā ca pathavī ajātā ca pathavīti.
tika-vin05t14:1_1: Tattha jātā nāma pathavī suddhapaṁsukā suddhamattikā appapāsāṇā appasakkharā appakaṭhalā appamarumbā appavālukā yebhuyyenapaṁsukā yebhuyyenamattikā,
tika-vin05t14:1_3: Yopi paṁsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā atirekacātumāsaṁ ovaṭṭho,
tika-vin05t14:1_5: Ajātā nāma pathavī suddhapāsāṇā suddhasakkharā suddhakaṭhalā suddhamarumbā suddhavālukā appapaṁsukā appamattikā yebhuyyenapāsāṇā yebhuyyenasakkharā yebhuyyenakaṭhalā yebhuyyenamarumbā yebhuyyenavālukā,
tika-vin05t14:1_7: Yopi paṁsupuñjo vā mattikāpuñjo vā omakacātumāsaṁ ovaṭṭho,
tika-vin05t14:2_0: Tattha jātapathaviṁ khaṇantassa khaṇāpentassa vā pācittiyaṁ. Tatrāyaṁ vinicchayo (pāci. aṭṭha. 86) – sace sayaṁ khaṇati, pahāre pahāre pācittiyaṁ. Sace aññaṁ āṇāpeti,
tika-vin05t14:2_2: āṇāpakassa ekameva pācittiyaṁ. Sace pana kusīto hoti, punappunaṁ āṇāpetabbo,
tika-vin05t14:2_3: taṁ āṇāpetvā khaṇāpentassa vācāya vācāya pācittiyaṁ.
tika-vin05t14:2_5: Khatāyeva hi pokkharaṇī nāma hoti. Tasmā ayaṁ kappiyavohāro.
tika-vin05t14:2_6: Esa nayo ‘‘vāpiṁ taḷākaṁ āvāṭaṁ khaṇā’’tiādīsupi. ‘‘Imaṁ okāsaṁ khaṇa,
tika-vin05t14:2_7: imasmiṁ okāse pokkharaṇiṁ khaṇā’’ti vattuṁ pana na vaṭṭati. ‘‘Kandaṁ khaṇa,
tika-vin05t14:2_8: mūlaṁ khaṇā’’ti aniyametvā vattuṁ vaṭṭati, ‘‘imaṁ valliṁ khaṇa,
tika-vin05t14:2_9: imasmiṁ okāse kandaṁ vā mūlaṁ vā khaṇā’’ti vattuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:3_1: Pokkharaṇiṁ sodhentehi yo kuṭehi ussiñcituṁ sakkā hoti tanukakaddamo, taṁ apanetuṁ vaṭṭati, bahalo na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:3_3: tatra yo heṭṭhā pathaviyā asambandho, tameva apanetuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:3_4: Udakena gataṭṭhāne udakapappaṭako nāma hoti, vātapahārena calati, taṁ apanetuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:3_7: chindituṁ bhindituṁ vā vaṭṭati, cātumāsato uddhaṁ na vaṭṭati. Sace pana udakeyeva patati,
tika-vin05t14:3_8: devena atirekacātumāsaṁ ovaṭṭhepi udakeyeva udakassa patitattā vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:4_1: sace tattha paṭhamameva sukhumarajaṁ patati, taṁ devena ovaṭṭhaṁ hoti,
tika-vin05t14:4_3: Udake pariyādinne soṇḍiṁ sodhentehi vikopetuṁ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:4_4: Sace paṭhamameva udakena pūrati, pacchā rajaṁ patati, taṁ vikopetuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:4_5: Tattha hi deve vassantepi udakeyeva udakaṁ patati.
tika-vin05t14:4_6: Piṭṭhipāsāṇe sukhumarajaṁ hoti, deve phusāyante allīyati,
tika-vin05t14:4_9: yathāsukhaṁ vikopetuṁ vaṭṭati. Sace abbhokāse uṭṭhahati,
tika-vin05t14:4_14: Sace pana heṭṭhimatalena bhūmisambandho hoti, ekadivasampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:5_0: Purāṇasenāsanaṁ hoti acchadanaṁ vā vinaṭṭhacchadanaṁ vā atirekacātumāsaṁ ovaṭṭhaṁ jātapathavīsaṅkhyameva gacchati,
tika-vin05t14:5_1: tato avasesaṁ chadaniṭṭhakaṁ vā gopānasīādikaṁ upakaraṇaṁ vā ‘‘iṭṭhakaṁ gaṇhāmi,
tika-vin05t14:5_2: gopānasiṁ bhittipādaṁ padarattharaṇaṁ pāsādatthambhaṁ gaṇhāmī’’ti saññāya gaṇhituṁ vaṭṭati, tena saddhiṁ mattikā patati, anāpatti,
tika-vin05t14:5_3: bhittimattikaṁ gaṇhantassa pana āpatti. Sace yā yā atintā, taṁ taṁ gaṇhāti, anāpatti. Antogehe mattikāpuñjo hoti,
tika-vin05t14:5_4: tasmiṁ ekadivasaṁ ovaṭṭhe gehaṁ chādenti. Sace sabbo tinto,
tika-vin05t14:5_6: Athassa uparibhāgoyeva tinto, anto atinto, yattakaṁ tintaṁ,
tika-vin05t14:5_7: taṁ kappiyakārakehi kappiyavohārena apanāmetvā sesaṁ yathāsukhaṁ vaḷañjetuṁ vaṭṭati udakena temitattā.
tika-vin05t14:5_8: Ekābaddhāyeva hi jātapathavī hoti, na itarāti.
tika-vin05t14:5_11: tattha laggapaṁsuṁ pana allahatthena chupitvā gahetuṁ vaṭṭati. Sace iṭṭhakapākāro hoti,
tika-vin05t14:5_14: Abbhokāse ṭhitamaṇḍapatthambhaṁ ito cito ca sañcāletvā pathaviṁ vikopentena gahetuṁ na vaṭṭati, ujukameva uddharituṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:5_15: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṁ sukkhakhāṇukaṁ vā gaṇhantassa eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t14:6_1: Navakammatthaṁ thambhaṁ vā pāsāṇaṁ vā rukkhaṁ vā daṇḍakehi uccāletvā pavaṭṭentā gacchanti , tattha jātapathavī bhijjati, sace suddhacittā pavaṭṭenti, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t14:6_2: Atha pana tena apadesena pathaviṁ bhinditukāmāyeva honti, āpatti.
tika-vin05t14:6_3: Sākhādīni kaḍḍhantānampi pathaviyaṁ dārūni phālentānampi eseva nayo.
tika-vin05t14:6_4: Pathaviyaṁ aṭṭhisūcikaṇṭakādīsupi yaṁ kiñci ākoṭetuṁ vā pavesetuṁ vā na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t14:6_5: ‘‘passāvadhārāya vegena pathaviṁ bhindissāmī’’ti evaṁ passāvampi kātuṁ na vaṭṭati. Karontassa bhijjati, āpatti,
tika-vin05t14:6_6: ‘‘visamabhūmiṁ samaṁ karissāmī’’ti sammajjaniyā ghaṁsitumpi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:6_8: Keci kattarayaṭṭhiyā bhūmiṁ koṭṭenti, pādaṅguṭṭhakena vilikhanti,
tika-vin05t14:6_9: ‘‘caṅkamitaṭṭhānaṁ dassessāmā’’ti punappunaṁ bhūmiṁ bhindantā caṅkamanti, sabbaṁ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t14:6_10: vīriyasampaggahatthaṁ pana samaṇadhammaṁ karontena suddhacittena caṅkamituṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:6_12: aghaṁsantena pana allahatthaṁ pathaviyaṁ ṭhapetvā rajaṁ gahetuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:7_0: Keci kaṇḍukacchuādīhi ābādhikā chinnataṭādīsu aṅgapaccaṅgāni ghaṁsanti, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:7_1: Jātapathaviṁ dahati vā dahāpeti vā, pācittiyaṁ,
tika-vin05t14:7_2: antamaso pattampi pacanto yattakesu ṭhānesu aggiṁ deti vā dāpeti vā, tattakāni pācittiyāni,
tika-vin05t14:7_3: tasmā pattaṁ pacantenapi pubbe pakkaṭṭhāneyeva pacitabbo.
tika-vin05t14:7_4: Adaḍḍhāya pathaviyā aggiṁ ṭhapetuṁ na vaṭṭati,
tika-vin05t14:7_5: pattapacanakapālassa pana upari aggiṁ ṭhapetuṁ vaṭṭati. Dārūnaṁ upari ṭhapeti,
tika-vin05t14:7_6: so aggi tāni dahanto gantvā pathaviṁ dahati, na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:7_8: Tatrāpi hi iṭṭhakādīnaṁyeva upari ṭhapetuṁ vaṭṭati. Kasmā? Tesaṁ anupādānattā.
tika-vin05t14:7_9: Na hi tāni aggissa upādānasaṅkhyaṁ gacchanti,
tika-vin05t14:7_11: Sace pana ‘‘pathaviṁ appattameva nibbāpetvā gamissāmī’’ti deti, vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:7_12: Pacchā nibbāpetuṁ na sakkoti, avisayattā anāpatti.
tika-vin05t14:7_13: Tiṇukkaṁ gahetvā gacchanto hatthe ḍayhamāne bhūmiyaṁ pāteti, anāpatti.
tika-vin05t14:7_14: Patitaṭṭhāneyeva upādānaṁ datvā aggiṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:7_15: Daḍḍhapathaviyā ca yattakaṁ ṭhānaṁ usumāya anugataṁ, sabbaṁ vikopetuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:8_0: Yo pana ajānanako bhikkhu araṇisahitena aggiṁ nibbattetvā hatthena ukkhipitvā ‘‘kiṁ karomī’’ti vadati, ‘‘jālehī’’ti vattabbo. ‘‘Hattho ḍayhatī’’ti vadati, ‘‘yathā na ḍayhati, tathā karohī’’ti vattabbo.
tika-vin05t14:8_5: ‘‘Imassa thambhassa āvāṭaṁ jāna, mahāmattikaṁ jāna, thusamattikaṁ jāna, mahāmattikaṁ dehi, thusamattikaṁ dehi, mattikaṁ āhara, paṁsuṁ āhara, mattikāya attho, paṁsunā attho ,
tika-vin05t14:8_8: imaṁ paṁsuṁ kappiyaṁ karohī’’ti evaṁ kappiyavohārena yaṁ kiñci kārāpetuṁ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin05t14:8_9: Aññavihito kenaci saddhiṁ kiñci kathento pādaṅguṭṭhakena kattarayaṭṭhiyā vā pathaviṁ vilikhanto tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin05t14:8_10: evaṁ asatiyā vilikhantassa bhindantassa vā anāpatti.
